sourcesContent:
import React, { Component } from 'react'; import { MDBInput, MDBInputSelect, MDBFormInline, MDBBtn, MDBContainer, MDBRow, MDBCol } from 'mdbreact'; import DocsLink from '../components/docsLink'; import SectionContainer from '../components/sectionContainer'; class InputPage extends Component { state = { value: 'Controlled input with value', iconInput: 'eye-slash', typeInput: 'password' }; nextInputRef = null; componentDidMount() { document .querySelectorAll('.iconHover') .forEach(el => (el.style.cursor = 'pointer')); } handleSubmit = event => { const { value } = this.state; alert(`MDBInput value: ${value}`); event.preventDefault(); }; saveToState = value => this.setState({ value }); getValue = value => console.log(value); handleChange = event => this.setState({ value: event.target.value }); changeFocus = () => this.nextInputRef.focus(); mouseEnter = () => { this.setState({ iconInput: 'eye', typeInput: 'text' }); }; mouseLeave = () => { this.setState({ iconInput: 'eye-slash', typeInput: 'password' }); }; render() { const { iconInput, typeInput, value } = this.state; return ( (this.nextInputRef = ref)} icon='envelope' /> alert('Wait! This is an alert!')} /> Submit Login
@
